title: Sayonara Isekai, Mata Kite Ashita
description: Finding himself lost and confused in a ruined world on the brink of collapse, Keisuke meets a young half-elf girl by the name of Nito. Nito seems to be searching for the
as described in her mother's journal and Keisuke agrees to accompany her on her journey. The two set forth, meeting and parting with all kinds of people...
author: Kazamidori
